summary: You Thought He Was Gone For Good Well You Were Wrong He Has Come Back From Hell And Seeks A Second Chance At Life. He Has Learned A Lot Of New Tricks And Wants Part Of The AssKIcking That Goes On in Skyrim.He Has Heard Of A DragonBorn Ands Wants To Join Forces With Him To Take Back The Stage
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Warning!  [/size][size=1]Please Don't Download If you Are Offended By Content Described This is Merely a Joke Not to be taken seriously. I do Not Glorify his actions Nor Do intend too...
He committed crimes against humanity but history must be remembered So his actions do not replicate in the future.[/size]....
[size=3]You are Free to leave At any time if you are disturbed![/size][size=1]

i intended him to be poorly made
[/size]



Adolf Hitler Once A Powerful MIlitary Leader And Evil AssHole Has Come Back Hell To Seek A New Life For Himself And Travel Away From His Universe To This Realm To Have A Fresh Start. Tho His Past Can't Be undone He Still See Himself As The [color=#cc0000][size=6]Fuhrer[/size][/color] .... Satan Has Consider Him A Powerful Ally in His Order And He Was Granted Special Powers....
